product_name: Voile Switchback Telemark Touring Bindings - Standard
long_description: The lightweight Voile Switchback telemark touring bindings allow backcountry skiers to ascend with zero heel resistance and then switch into downhill telemark mode for speedy descents. Bindings let you easily switch between free-pivot touring mode and downhill telemark mode with the use of a ski pole. Free-pivot mechanism is designed to resist ice and snow buildup for hassle-free touring. Weighing in at 3 lbs. per pair, the Switchback bindings are the lightest free-pivot bindings on the market. Full wraparound stainless-steel toe plates stand up to regular backcountry use. Bindings include 2 climbing wires that lift your heels 65mm and 100mm to take the strain of your legs while skinning up hills. Spinning spring cartridges allow easy length adjustments; stainless-steel hooks and rods add strength and durability. Voile Switchback telemark touring bindings with standard-length rods fit boot sizes 27 - 31 mondo.
short_description: The lightweight Voile Switchback telemark touring bindings allow backcountry skiers to ascend with zero heel resistance and then switch into downhill telemark mode for speedy descents.
